chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: High Lord Tedosian, p. 70 (52)—High Lord of Tear, and husband to High Lady Alteima. Alteima hopes that he will die soon, and even tried to poison him. His wife was sent away and he was left with Estanda, with whom Alteima believes he is plotting to kill her.
